text: BX-912 is a small molecule that inhibits 3-phosphoinositide dependent protein kinase-1. The phosphoinositide 3-kinase/3-phosphoinositide-dependent kinase 1 (PDK1)/AKT signaling pathway plays a role in cancer cell growth, and tumor angiogenesis, and could be a new target for anti-cancer drugs. Tumor angiogenesis and vascular patterning == References == Category:EC 2.7.11 Category:Imidazoles Category:Bromoarenes Category:Aminopyrimidines Category:Ureas Category:Kinase inhibitors
title: BX-912
